nodes.text: The Migrant Merchants' Guild headquarters was an area in the Old Galactic Market on Coruscant. It was the site of the headquarters of the Migrant Merchants' Guild, a criminal organization that was involved in bribes, corruption, money laundering, and smuggling.

The headquarters was home to both militant and peaceful members of the guild, ranging from shooters and scouts to smugglers and off-world refugee foragers. The headquarters also had a facility for female dancers to perform and live. Ria Deleru was one of these dancers.
